thread.title: Marcia

author: Marcia
title: Marcia
text: I have used several house/pet sitters through TtustedHousesitters during the past 2 years. Each time, I have connected with individuals who take great care of my pets and home. The situation is mutually beneficial as I do not have to board my animals or pay for a sitter, and the sitters have lodging without the expense of a hotel and are able to explore my part of the world in a leisurely manner.
